miniha list eka aragena kama eke thibuna chapathi ekak aragena mata kannalu.poddak wenas thamayi.mokada karanne mata set wenne mama wagema un thama kiyala hithagena eekath kawa.mu ara ganan tika aragena fon eken wena ekekuta kiwa.mama hithuwa dan mokek hari payithek ooke adu padu kiyayi kiyala.ehema dila mage ayadumpatha aragena tikak wela kiyawala.magen ekama eka prashnayak ahuwa.
